category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_permitted_transfer_sites
preference.preference_description: Defines which sites are authorized to transfer ownership of objects owned by the site served by an IDSM server. If not defined, no site is allowed to transfer ownership of any object from this site. Valid Values: One or more strings; each string must be a valid Teamcenter site name.
